quotes.quote: Its not easy taking your own advice, accepting what you don't like hearing, & seeing the grey amongst the black & white.
It is not easy to keep silent when silence is a lie.
An easy way to find your own style is to exaggerate yourself a bit and then find a balance.
It's easy to make good decisions when there are no bad options.
People will always have an opinion, but you have to live life the way you want to. It's very easy to tell others what to do, but difficult to implement it on yourself.
It is easy to believe we are each waves and forget we are also the ocean.
It is easy to get everything you want, provided you first learn to do without the things you cannot get.
It is easy to love people when they smell good, but sometimes they slip into the manure of life and smell awful. You must love them just as much when they smell foul.
It is easy to sit up and take notice, What is difficult is getting up and taking action.
There is no easy walk to freedom anywhere.
It is easier to align our opinions with facts, than it is to align facts with our opinions.
Change is never easy, and it often creates discord, but when people come together for the good of humanity and the Earth, we can accomplish great things.
There are no easy answers, but there are simple answers. We must have the courage to do what we know is morally right.
It's very easy to be different, but very difficult to be better.
It is not easy to do something good, but it is extremely difficult to do something bad.
Difficult things aren't easy, but they're worth it.
It's easy to say young people should believe in themselves, but the number one thing is recognizing that it's a journey, that you have to build confidence in yourself.
When something comes easy, you usually let it go the same way.

It's always easy to blame others. You can spend your entire life blaming the world, but your successes or failures are entirely your own responsibility. You can try to stop time, but it's a complete waste of energy.
The voice of conscience is so delicate that it is easy to stifle it, but it is also so clear that it is impossible to mistake it.
It is easy to make promises it is hard work to keep them.
It's easy to make money when you have a lot of it.
Easy things should be easy, and hard things should be possible.
It was all too easy to make things up, it was like skating on thin ice, it was like doing dainty pirouettes on a brittle crust over water thousands of fathoms deep.
It's easy to be complicated but very difficult to be simple.
It is easy to make promises, it is hard work to keep them.
If we all tried to make other people's paths easy, our own feet would have a smooth even place to walk on.
Easy is right. Begin right and you are easy. Continue easy and you are right. The right way to go easy is to forget the right way, and forget that the going is easy.
Life is easy to chronicle, but bewildering to practice.
It's easy to see the negative, but every person has something great about them. Develop a habit of looking for the good.
It's easy to fool the eye but it's hard to fool the heart.
Things aren't always easy, but you just have to keep going and don't let the small stuff bog you down.
An easy life doesn't teach us anything. In the end it's the learning that matters: what we've learned and how we've grown
Nothing is so easy as to deceive one's self for what we wish, that we readily believe; but such expectations are often inconsistent with the real state of things.
There is always an easy solution to every problem neat, plausible, and wrong.
